title: About Me
content:
I am a results-driven DevOps Engineer with 11+ years of IT experience, including 4+ years in DevOps and 7 years in System Administration. My expertise spans CI/CD automation (Jenkins, GitLab), cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Ansible, Prometheus, and Grafana.

Dew Software Pvt. Ltd (client: Lucid Motors), I played a key role in OTA software updates, production-grade monitoring, and release workflow optimization, ensuring efficient and reliable automotive software delivery. Recently, I earned a certification in AI Tools & Prompt Engineering, applying generative AI to streamline DevOps workflows and boost productivity.
